description.p: I think these are funnier than some of the real valentines

transcript.p: Pictured: A terribly drawn version of Lee is in the back of a Ford pickup truck. He looks so god damn bad. He's like a mix of Family Guy and Control Alt Delete. He's smirking at the camera with one eyebrow raised.
Caption: Russia isn't a real place you cuck!! Owned by the facts!!!!
Pictured: A painted Lee is stomping forward with a smile. His arms were replaced with photos of bodybuilders' arms
Caption: If You Make Fun Of My Spongebob Fanfic Ever Again I Will Write The Callout Post To End All Callout Posts and As God Is My Witness You Will Rue The Day You Messed With Me!!!!
Pictured: The exact same terrible Lee drawing is staring at us.
Caption: Art is communication, and baby, I'm screaming like a banshee!!!
